After a long process of overthinking, worrying and postponing, I finally decided to begin this blog.
With an ever-growing interest in music and all processes around it, I was tempted to try my hand at songwriting over two years ago. My previousâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Self-Titled
frontmatter.description: After a long process of overthinking, worrying and postponing, I finally decided to begin this blog.

node.excerpt: Say We Did It (The Comfort Out of the Blue) When my truth hit hard  Shattering the foundations of the deepest lie  A journey for one to face solo  Anybody else would've looked the other way  But you held on tighter  Helped make the situation feel aâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Say We Did It (The Comfort Out of the Blue)
frontmatter.description: It's the comfort I'll find in never lying again to you.

frontmatter.title: Say We Did It (The Comfort Out of the Blue)
frontmatter.description: It's the comfort I'll find in never lying again to you.

node.excerpt: ...Don't You? You don't want my love  Then...  You don't want my love  But... Even though I know that you wouldn't love me enough  I could take the little bit you can give  It couldn't even be one-sided  Borrow the much you need  Living on with aâ€¦

...Don't You? You don't want my love  Then...  You don't want my love  But... Even though I know that you wouldn't love me enough  I could take the little bit you can give  It couldn't even be one-sided  Borrow the much you need  Living on with aâ€¦

Now We're Talking Yeah, now we're talking!  That's just about right  As we dive into this looped beat  You're sure to come alive Yeah, now we're talking!  We move our worries into the night  Forget that maybe thereâ€™s a tomorrow  As soon as it droppedâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Now We're Talking
frontmatter.description: It's somewhat late to try it.

messages.title: Poems With Choruses
messages.description: Documenting life as I try to fit it in the lyrics of a song.
messages.author: Robson Junior
